channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘No Meeting Planned’ Between Putin and Zelensky, Top Russian Diplomat Says
item.description: It was the clearest sign yet that President Trump’s push for an imminent summit was faltering.

item.title: Gaza City and Surrounding Areas Officially Hit by Famine, Global Group Says
item.description: At least half a million people in the enclave were facing the most severe conditions measured by U.N.-backed international experts: starvation, acute ...

item.title: Trump declares war on clean energy. The numbers show it’s the only thing keeping America’s lights affordable
item.description: The “scam of the century,” according to Trump, is the only thing keeping bills from soaring.

item.title: A Critic of Universities Is Rallying to Defend Them in the Trump Era
item.description: The Foundation for Individual Rights and Expression has long been a critic of progressive campus culture. Now it’s taking on new, and surprising, targ...

item.title: I’m the president of a $1 billion software unicorn and I’ve seen the ‘Gen Z stare’ disappear in healthy workplaces. It’s a wake-up call for hospitality
item.description: That so-called stare isn’t a withdrawal; it’s a mirror.

item.title: China’s economic data is famously unreliable—and could be a warning if Trump meddles with the Bureau of Labor Statistics
item.description: Beijing “is really intolerant of economic instability, and so everything gets smoothed,” Derek Scissors of the American Enterprise Institute says.

item.title: Jerome Powell Suggests Fed Will Soon Cut Interest Rates in Jackson Hole Speech

item.title: In Minnesota, ‘dairy princesses’ take home a 90-pound butter bust of their own heads
item.description: They can deep-freeze their heads as souvenirs or share them with family and friends.

item.title: Apple just indirectly boosted the value of its all-in-one subscription service
item.description: Apple hiked the price of Apple TV+ earlier this week, the third time it's done that since 2019.

item.title: Former Sri Lankan President Ranil Wickremesinghe Arrested on Corruption Charges
item.description: The ex-leader, Ranil Wickremesinghe, was arrested amid government investigations into widespread bribery and graft.
